me.codeboy.common.base.net.core

Class CBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.codeboy.common.base.net.core.CBConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CBHttp, CBHttps

    public class CBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    网络操作，可以获取网页源代码，下载网络文件
